movies.title: The Mitchells vs. The Machines
movies.short_review: From the same folks as Lego Movie and Spiderverse, this animated movie is a masterpiece. Until the end...it gets too sappy for too long.

movies.title: The Trial of the Chicago 7
movies.short_review: Incredibly well done. A Sorkin fill as good as any other.

movies.title: Borat Subsequent Moviefilm
movies.short_review: Entertaining throughout, but ultimately falls flat compared to the original.

movies.title: Palm Springs
movies.short_review: A damn good time. Lighthearted romcom that most everyone would enjoy.
